document.full_text: the ice hockey rivalry between canada and russia will play out another chapter this week at the world ice hockey championship in a do-or-die game canadian captain rick nash said will be filled with emotion.
document.title: canada to renew rivalry with russia at worlds
lines_and_colors: the ice hockey rivalry between canada and russia will play out another chapter this week at the world ice hockey championship in a do-or-die game canadian captain rick nash said will be filled with emotion.
